The aims current study two-fold : 1 ) compare cardiorespiratory fitness ( CRF ) gait endurance across three group people : ( 1 ) individual Parkinson Disease ( PD ) participate box regular basis , ( 2 ) individual PD participate exercise box regular basis ( 3 ) healthy control age exercise regular basis 2 ) examine relationship CRF motor symptom PD ( bradykinesia , tremor postural instability ) . In single testing session , participant perform follow test : ( 1 ) clinical performance measure ( 2 ) CRF assessment . A one-way ANOVA appropriate post hoc test use examine difference dependent variable across three exercise group . Relationships CRF clinical performance measure evaluate Pearson 's correlation coefficient .
